resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Primary Design [UMLS]
resource.description: Value set defining codes for primary designs of studies in a ResearchStudy resource.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Primary Purpose [UMLS, NCI]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify the primary purpose of a study in a ResearchStudy resource.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Recruitment Status Register [UMLS, Local]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify the study recruitment status (from a register) in a ResearchStudy resource.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Sampling Method Non Probability [NCI, local]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify types of non-probability sampling methods.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Sampling Method [NCI, local]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify types of sampling methods.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Sampling Probability Method [NCI]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify types of probability sampling methods.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Status Halted Stage [Local]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify the status of a study when it was halted.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Status When Intervention [Local]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify the status of a study in case of an intervention in a ResearchStudy resource.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Subject [SNOMED CT]
resource.description: Value set defining codes for study sujects in a ResearchStudy resource.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Time Perspectives [UMLS]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify the time perspective of a study in a ResearchStudy resource.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Type Interventional [UMLS]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify the type of an interventional study in a ResearchStudy resource.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Study Type Non Interventional [UMLS, local]
resource.description: Value set defining codes to specify the type of a non interventional study in a ResearchStudy resource.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Use Rights Label [SPDX, UMLS, Local]
resource.description: Value set used to indicate the use rights related to a resource.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Yes, No, Not Applicable [SNOMED CT]
resource.description: Value set used to respond to questions that can be answered Yes, No, or Not Applicable.

resource.name: NFDI4Health VS MDS Yes, No, Undecided [SNOMED CT, NCI]
resource.description: Value set used to respond to questions that can be answered Yes, No, or Undecided

resource.name: NFDI4Health_EX_MDS_Related
resource.description: Extension providing information about related publications, datasets, study documents, web pages, etc.
